ef81b1a52c914710b3388caebfe7233a-1.description: Displays custom callback to the page

objectSharedProperty.description: The objectAttributes property on the shared state to put the callback input into (if applicable)
objectSharedProperty.title: Object Attributes Shared Property

objectTransientProperty.description: The objectAttributes property on the transient state to put the callback input into (if applicable)
objectTransientProperty.title: Object Attributes Transient Property

options.description:
The options containing the parameters for the callback (see documentation for possible parameters: https://docs.pingidentity.com/pingoneaic/latest/am-scripting/scripting-api-node.html#scripting-api-node-callbacks). 

For example, for textOutputCallback, the options could be: { messageType: 0, message: "Hello World!" }. 

Note that for required parameters that are not specified in the options will use default values based on the type of the parameter ("" for Strings, [] for Arrays, {} for Objects, 0 for Ints, 0.0 for Doubles, and false for Booleans).
options.title: Options

sharedProperty.description: The shared state property to put the callback input into (if applicable)
sharedProperty.title: Shared State Property

transientProperty.description: The transient state property to put the callback input into (if applicable)
transientProperty.title: Transient State Property
